column4: Hi, sorry this is a really dumb question, but how do I increase the number of desktop workspaces?
Are you using compiz?
Do you have ccsm installed?
I think so, it that just the setting page?
Click on general settings
Then go to the desktop size tab.
bahh i missed it lol, wasnt expecting it to have sliders
This is the confusion part. If you want to have a cube set H to 4, V to 1 and #D to 1.
this is weried, i have 4 hor, 1 vert but only 1 vertical desktop
the cube is no longer enough for me lol
It works best to keep the V and # desk to 1
yeah just tired increasing those but made no difference to the cude
You can change the H to up to 32.
awesome, anyway of putting a desktop as lids?
Nope. You can put cube cpas though.
Hmm, would have been nice to have the desktops there instead of a colour/image
Sorry :(
No worries, thanks for the help though
OK np
Try man devilspie
bruenig: Cool thanks for the help
